lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Transamerican said it is the second largest producer of natural gas in Texas with reserves of 1.2 trillion cubic feet and more than 1,000 miles of pipeline and gas gathering lines.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: After the hearing, John Nabors, a lawyer for TransAmerican, said the company would pursue its state court lawsuit seeking 2.0 billion dlrs in damages from Coastal.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. bankruptcy judge Manuel Leal also ruled that TransAmerican could pursue its two billion dlr lawsuit against Coastal that alleges the Houston based gas company is attempting to unlawfully gain control of Transamerican's Texas gas reserve and pipeline system.
